entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #9: Improve Wiki PDF export
entry.content: • Target version changed from v0.2 - Public Beta to v0.4 - Wiki Enhancements

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #9: Improve Wiki PDF export
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Closed

There is no longer an export as PDF option, and the plugin mentioned is not supported in the current version of Redmine.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #9: Improve Wiki PDF export
entry.content: That's a shame. We should still keep track of this issue for future reference. I think having the ability to render out printable versions of wiki pages (for manuals, etc) would be very helpful.
